thread.title: FA to sell Wembley season-tickets starting at £999 – but it doesn’t include FA Cup Final

author: dwright
title: FA to sell Wembley season-tickets starting at £999 – but it doesn’t include FA Cup Final

organizations.name: lithuania world cup qualifier  head of club wembley

text:
sweet fa FA to sell Wembley season-tickets starting at £999 – but it doesn’t include FA Cup Final 
Wembley offer 'guarantees a seat at the biggest games' apart from the biggest match of all at the venue By Duncan Wright 30th March 2017, 10:30 am Updated: 30th March 2017, 4:38 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments THE FA have announced the sale of their first ever Wembley season tickets starting at £999 – but watching the FA Cup final is not thrown in. 
Wembley bosses claim the deal “guarantees seats at the biggest games”, yet they don’t include a seat to the biggest game of all in the stadium. Getty Images 3 Wembley season tickets are going on sale for the first time ever 
Club Wembley has launched the new Southview Season Ticket, which will offer seats for an average of nine matches a year including all England games, the EFL Cup Final and both FA Cup semi-finals. 
Prices start at £999 per season, with a matchday programme thrown in, but anyone buying the season ticket will still have to fork out more if they wanted to watch the FA Cup Final. Getty Images 3 The season ticket for Wembley promises a seat for all the biggest matches – except the FA Cup Final 
It works out at an average of £111 per game, and food is not included in the offer. 
Wembley officials claim they have provided the deal in response to calls from fans who wanted to watch all the high profile matches at the stadium. 
But whether supporters will be happy that they don’t get a guaranteed seat at the biggest game of all remains to be seen. Most read in football YOU WHAT? Alexis Sanchez casts doubts over Arsenal future after saying he wants to stay in London and play for winning team Yes way Jose Jose Mourinho is eyeing up a potential move for Atletico Madrid centre-back Jose Gimenez 'He is absurd' Jose Mourinho compares Manchester United's attempts to buy Neymar as like trying to crack open a vault Handy Andy Gladbach confirm Andreas Christensen WILL return to Chelsea after ace impressed Antonio Conte CUT AND DRIES Manchester United to offer £30m Dries Mertens £4.3m salary in bid to poach him from Napoli Heavy police presence at Wembley ahead of England vs Lithuania World Cup Qualifier 
Head of Club Wembley Nick Read said: "We listened to the fans who wanted new ways to enjoy football at our iconic stadium. 
"Making the Club Wembley experience more accessible through the introduction of our first ever season ticket will do just that. 
"With guaranteed seats in prime positions at the biggest games, Southview Season is a fantastic concept for anyone who wants to add something special to their matchday experience." The Southview Season package - from £999 per season 
Guaranteed seat for all England Men’s Senior home games, EFL Cup Final, FA Community Shield and Emirates FA Cup Semi-Finals 
Option to buy Emirates FA Cup Final tickets 
Complimentary match day programme 
Choice of enticing street food and match day favourites 
Access to buy tickets to other must see sporting events and music concerts 
Option to transfer your tickets to friends and family Getty Images
